Asif Sattar wrote:
> createLogFile() is private static because I want there to
> be only one instance of the logger class , the class
> createLogFile() belongs to (it's a singleton).

It's not wise to implement a singleton with all class-level methods. 
Have /one/ class-level method to obtain the singleton instance:

public Singleton getInstance() {
     return singletonInstance;
}

...and make the remaining methods instance-level ("non-static"). This 
makes it considerably easier to test those methods, as well as the 
methods that use them.
